rules.mutation: 在指定位置发生任意氨基酸替换
rules.mutation_logic: (pos53_mut | pos65_mut | pos68_mut | pos159_mut | pos211_mut | pos217_mut | pos224_mut | pos271_mut | pos272_mut | pos273_mut | pos275_mut | pos278_mut | pos331_mut | pos341_mut | pos391_mut)
rules.comment: 依赖权利要求107/108/114，需结合其限定的野生型序列。

rules.mutation: 在指定位置发生特定氨基酸替换
rules.statement: 保护在指定位置发生特定残基替换（如53T、65L、68R等）中至少一个的工程化末端脱氧核苷酸转移酶变体。
rules.comment: 从属于权利要求209，继承其位置限定并进一步限定具体突变类型。

rules.statement: 保护在SEQ ID NO:3302基础上，在指定单点或组合位置发生突变的工程化末端脱氧核苷酸转移酶。
rules.comment: 覆盖所有列出的单点突变及组合突变模式，无序列同一性限制。

rules.wild_type: 未知野生型序列（需参考权利要求105）
rules.mutation: 在指定位置发生任意氨基酸替换
rules.mutation_logic: (pos80_mut | pos87_mut | pos105_mut | pos109_mut | pos111_mut | pos143_mut | pos147_mut | pos157_mut | pos160_mut | pos180_mut | pos203_mut | pos209_mut | pos226_mut | pos256_mut | pos261_mut | pos266_mut | pos279_mut | pos327_mut | pos339_mut | pos349_mut | pos353_mut | pos364_mut)
rules.statement: 保护在指定22个位置中至少一个位置发生任意氨基酸差异的工程化末端脱氧核苷酸转移酶变体。
rules.comment: 依赖权利要求105定义的基础序列，保护范围覆盖任一指定位置的非特异性突变。

rules.wild_type: 未知野生型序列（需参考权利要求105）
rules.mutation: 在指定位置发生特定氨基酸替换
rules.statement: 保护在指定22个位置中至少一个位置发生所列特定氨基酸替换的工程化末端脱氧核苷酸转移酶变体。
rules.comment: 从属于权利要求112，进一步限定突变为特定氨基酸残基，缩小保护范围但增强特异性。

rules.mutation_logic: (mutated_at_2 & mutated_at_41)
rules.statement: Protects any sequence with mutations at both position 2 and 41, regardless of amino acid identity.
rules.comment: No SEQ ID provided; assumes any amino acid substitution at specified positions is covered.

rules.mutation_logic: (mutated_at_2 & mutated_at_42)
rules.statement: Protects any sequence with mutations at both position 2 and 42, regardless of amino acid identity.
rules.comment: No SEQ ID provided; assumes any amino acid substitution at specified positions is covered.

rules.mutation_logic: (mutated_at_2 & mutated_at_43)
rules.statement: Protects any sequence with mutations at both position 2 and 43, regardless of amino acid identity.
rules.comment: No SEQ ID provided; assumes any amino acid substitution at specified positions is covered.

rules.mutation_logic: (pos2_mutated & pos84_mutated)
rules.statement: Protects any sequence with mutations at both position 2 and 84, regardless of amino acid identity or overall sequence similarity.
rules.comment: Assumes minimal protection scope based on positional mutation requirement without defined wild-type or residue constraints.

rules.mutation_logic: (pos2_mutated & pos85_mutated)
rules.statement: Protects any sequence with mutations at both position 2 and 85, regardless of amino acid identity or overall sequence similarity.
rules.comment: Assumes minimal protection scope based on positional mutation requirement without defined wild-type or residue constraints.

rules.mutation_logic: (pos2_mutated & pos86_mutated)
rules.statement: Protects any sequence with mutations at both position 2 and 86, regardless of amino acid identity or overall sequence similarity.
rules.comment: Assumes minimal protection scope based on positional mutation requirement without defined wild-type or residue constraints.

rules.mutation: 任意突变组合导致可溶性表达增加
rules.mutation_logic: ANY_MUTATION & increased_soluble_expression
rules.statement: 保护任何相对于野生型或参考工程化TdT具有增加可溶性表达的突变体
rules.comment: 功能限定型保护，不依赖具体突变位点，需实验验证表型

rules.mutation: 任意突变组合导致高温活性增加
rules.mutation_logic: ANY_MUTATION & increased_thermostable_activity
rules.statement: 保护任何相对于野生型或参考工程化TdT具有增加高温活性的突变体
rules.comment: 功能限定型保护，不依赖具体突变位点，需实验验证表型

rules.mutation: 任意突变组合导致副产物减少
rules.mutation_logic: ANY_MUTATION & reduced_byproduct_formation
rules.statement: 保护任何相对于野生型或参考工程化TdT具有减少副产物形成的突变体
rules.comment: 功能限定型保护，不依赖具体突变位点，需实验验证表型
